title: Does not allow me to go onto the log in screen after launching launcher
body:
Whenever I click the launch button, it does not allow me to go onto the login screen, I can keep repeating the process but it still does not work
Can anyone please help me?

replies.body:
Can you clarify what you experience after trying to launch? Does literally nothing happen or do you receive any error messages? Try launching League as admin by right-clicking on the shortcut and select 'run as admin'.

Let me know what happens.

For anyone who wants to bypass the launching process of the Beta Client for respective reasons.

Go to your League of Legends install folder. Default is (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) go to \RADS\system
Locate the user.cfg file and open with notepad
Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
Save and launch League of Legends again.
It is imperative you avoid upgrading/switching to the Beta Client afterward.

Stay lit fam.


(THIS WILL WORK, courtesy of the guy in a few threads below)
